text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Ooh～! Now ain't this a downright fancy inn! Don't see places like this on the usual camps. Real sweet of 'em to let us crash here～!

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: Apparently the Sacred Equine Relay is held not too far away, so it looks like the perfect spot to devote ourselves to our training.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: …… Oguriii. You leave those food daydreams where they at, eh～?

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: H-How did you know I was helping myself to another bite……?

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Your eyes're practically lighting up! Hol' up, you were getting more chow!?

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: Hahaa! You lot don't miss a beat! Betcha they got a nice hot spring for us here though.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: Hehe. It's shaping up to be a whole different atmosphere from the yearly summer camp, I'm finding it quite exciting.
—— Dear guests from Tracen Academy, thank you for making the long journey here.

text_block_list.name: President Mukai
text_block_list.text: My name is Mukai and I serve as the president of the Sacred Equine Relay Heritage Preservation Association. I will be your mentor. It is my pleasure to be working with you.

text_block_list.name: All Together
text_block_list.text: We look forward to your guidance!

text_block_list.name: President Mukai
text_block_list.text: A strong and excited reply, very good. I am pleased to see you all are highly motivated.

text_block_list.name: President Mukai
text_block_list.text: Right then, pardon the abruptness, but once you have unpacked we shall head straight for the Relay's Precinct — the ritual grounds where the Sacred Equine Relay will take place.

text_block_list.name: President Mukai
text_block_list.text: You will observe the location of the ceremony there today, followed by a brief overview of what to expect on this preparation camp.

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: Wooah…! This here's the Relay's Precinct, issit? Sky stretchin' far as the eye can see. Feels amazin' to be standin' here.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: Moreover, there is an air of serenity about this place. It's as if we have been separated from the mundane ——

text_block_list.name: President Mukai
text_block_list.text: —— This is the consecrated ground upon which the Sacred Equine Relay is held. What you are perceiving might be remnants of past ceremonies.

text_block_list.name: President Mukai
text_block_list.text: —— Right. Allow me to explain how this preparation will unfold further then. Please listen closely.

text_block_list.name: President Mukai
text_block_list.text: From today forth, you will endeavor to master the Threading of Memories and Dash of Remembrance, which are the two rituals that make up the Sacred Equine Relay.

text_block_list.name: President Mukai
text_block_list.text: The objective set is for every single one of you to be capable of performing the whole ceremony from beginning to end.

text_block_list.name: President Mukai
text_block_list.text: Once midway this preparation camp, and once on its final day, you shall hold a presentation where I shall judge your progress. Please take these as your primary targets for the time being.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: So each of us should be able to perform all the rituals…… We're bound'a have a lot to pick up, so tha's sure sounding a mighty challenge.

text_block_list.name: President Mukai
text_block_list.text: —— After the final presentation, and if I have judged there to be no issues, you will decide among yourselves who will lead the rituals, come the day.

text_block_list.name: President Mukai
text_block_list.text: Albeit a brief overview, that is all you will need to know for now. …… Does anyone have questions?

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: Yes.

text_block_list.name: President Mukai
text_block_list.text: Ms. Yaeno Muteki, correct? Go ahead.

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: …… What happens should we fail to master the ceremony satisfactorily by the final presentation?

text_block_list.name: President Mukai
text_block_list.text: If I judge you to not have reached the required standard by then, the Sacred Equine Relay will not be held this year.

text_block_list.name: President Mukai
text_block_list.text: I hope that you will strive to fulfill your duties in recognition of the importance of this ceremony.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: …… In short, we've some serious responsibility on our hands now. F'sure, yeah, but that also makes it worthwhile! Friends, we're bringing our A-game!

text_block_list.name: President Mukai
text_block_list.text: Your words are very encouraging. Practice will begin in earnest tomorrow.

text_block_list.name: President Mukai
text_block_list.text: I hope that you endeavor to make this Sacred Equine Relay a splendid one — for all the horsegirls who chose to run.
A day later, the preparation camp was in full swing ——

text_block_list.name: President Mukai
text_block_list.text: —— Today you will start practicing the initial part of the Threading of Memories, one of the two rituals.

text_block_list.name: President Mukai
text_block_list.text: The first step in the Threading of Memories is the ritual offering of hoofplaques, carrying wishes of retired horsegirls, to the flames at the alter by the foot of the mountain.

text_block_list.name: President Mukai
text_block_list.text: To perform, before these rising flames, a votive dance in demonstration of reverence is the first duty given to the Sacred Equines.

text_block_list.name: President Mukai
text_block_list.text: You will begin by learning the basics of posture and breathing before we continue step by step through the choreography.

text_block_list.name: President Mukai
text_block_list.text: —— Halt! You are all still rushing through too much. Try to be more aware of the flow, the balance of stillness and motion. Try this part again.

text_block_list.name: All Together
text_block_list.text: Yes, m'am!

text_block_list.name: President Mukai
text_block_list.text: —— You two. Your steps are still too quick. Let the stride and rhythm come to you. Same part, from the top, please.

text_block_list.name: All Together
text_block_list.text: Yes, m'am!!

text_block_list.name: President Mukai
text_block_list.text: —— That concludes group practice for this morning. Thank you all for your hard work.

text_block_list.name: President Mukai
text_block_list.text: You will have another group practice session this evening. Rest up, and keep in mind what I told you earlier. I shall leave you to your day then ——

text_block_list.name: All Together
text_block_list.text: Thank you, m'am……!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: —— Gwaah～! 'S a fair amount tougher than I imagined…! Using all my body and brain's got me more knackered than training……!

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: This must be what it means to uphold a noble duty…… Truly, a trial…!

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: Heheh, if we're startin' out like this, I don' wanna go thinkin' about what's in store for us later. This camp gon' be a riot…!
